6. • Dollars may or may not be available for new programming.
Certainly no new dollars have been committed to replace
PBL. On the other hand. Ford and Corporation dollars
apparently can continue through September, 1969, all
other things being equal.
7. I emphasized the promise as well as good preliminary
accomplishment by the regional networks in use of their
own hour of service weekly and that we were investigating
our proper role as ETS/PS in scheduling the other hour
of programming weekly which is currently ours.
8. I described the MI-COM presentation we had received
earlier and indicated that we didn*t yet know enough
about it to pass judgment, but that it was interesting and
well worth pursuing so far as determining its true capa¬
bility and cost for the future, and that we should make no
secret about it to AT&T so they will understand that we
have indeed begun investigation of this alternative system
